title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma and others into a single CLI + REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; installable via PyPI.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving LangChain apps native access to Ollama-hosted models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-user, model manager, OpenAI-compat endpoints).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting and context management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with Android compatibility and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama API access.

title: ollama-chatbot (streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that connects to local Ollama instance with session memory.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team enabling retrieval pipelines with local models.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async IEnumerables and System.Text.Json serialization.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Curated collection of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama with WebUI, Open-WebUI, Redis, Postgres, etc.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS for local Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into Discord threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers and run model tests.
